List of Trilemmas

06 Jan 2019

You can only have two of the three

“At any stage, humans can thirst for money, knowledge or love; sometimes for two, never for three.” - NN Taleb

Blockchain systems: Decentralization, scalability, security. - V. Buterin

Migration: Accountability of officials, equal treatment under the law, ability to absorb large number of migrants. - P. Romer
